data.name: PropertyConcept
desc: These constants are used to specify concepts of the introspection which apply to properties and to the methods which represent attributes.
This list is not necessarily complete; new constants may be added.

items.name: ALL
lines: This value is used to query for all properties.

items.name: DANGEROUS
lines: specifies that the change or retrieval of this property directly by the user can result in an unstable state (deadlock, application crash, security hole, etc.)

items.name: PROPERTYSET
lines: specifies all properties which are reachable by XPropertySet, XFastPropertySet or XMultiPropertySet.

items.name: ATTRIBUTES
lines: specifies all properties which are actually attributes of interfaces.

items.name: METHODS
lines: specifies all properties which are represented by getter or setter methods.
These methods have the signature type get...(), void set...() or boolean is...().
